comments.comment:
The citizens of this country lothe all 225 Sinhala, Muslim and Tamil  politicians, in the parliament.!!! Why are you all fighting each other like stray dogs without considering the situation in the country, talk about the policies, how you people are going to develop this country, specially people like you, condemning others when each one in the parliament has done something wrong.!!!
This country need a total change in the system where 225 deshapaluwooes enjoy all perks and privileges and the people who vote for them at the mercy of these senseless, brainless politicians!!!!
Hell is the best place suitable got 225, uncivilized, crazy  politicos in this country, as people don't believe in anyone in the Blue, Green or Red Party as they all shouting from the top of their voice to capture power and go on enjoying the privileges that they don't want to lose.!!!

replies.replyComment:
Any modaya, thopi wage gonnu hinda thamai adapi methathwe enne. Thopi free wif walata ravitila me Jadaplanya genawa. Dan kohomada.
Fools like you are on facebook 24x7 but do not even know how to go to colombo and get a copy of the 2013 Panatha or go to a library and do a search for a document or even do a google search and find information. You believe every jokers lie - listen to the Mujibur who lied about  Zaharan and now you believe him??? Stupid as stupid can be.


Modaya, the 2013 act was bought to bring machinery and materiel to the free trade zone- especially for garment industries where cloth styles change, material change very quickly (due to changes in taste and also weather in cold climates). Idea was to get the material in to a closed zone, make clothes and reexport- without delay. No purpose in imposing taxes twice and increasing the price of the exported goods as they have to compete with china lower cost good...


The processing of garbage was done by this Jadaplanya  and inf act signed by the traitor UNP ministers with Singapore. Dhamikka Perera is a traitor to our motherland and should be treated like that for what he did with this trash. Trash was processed by a Diaspora guy in England. I challenge you to find the name.  This UNP traitors  is hand in hand with Diaspora- especially Mongal.


We lived through suicide bombs and we appreciate everything MR did. We remember before MR came, where at the mear mention of LTTE police used to run leaving there weapons. Over thousand soldiers were massacred by LTTE in one attack in Mulative and under Sanghidiyava Chandrika and Ponil. Tey were our brothers and sisters and we will not forget them- unlike you animals that do not even know where you came from. Learn how Palestians now live as refugees in their own motherland--- that is the fate awaiting Sri lankan fools like You!!! Thuuk nodokin ungrateful traitors like you!!!! Read about why the Philippines leader is loved by their people and hated by world powers-- because like MR he is looking after his country and not a tool for world powers like chandrika, ponil and rest of this Jadapalanya!!!!

replies.replyComment:
@Tharaka Amarasinghe Ane pol buruwa.!! Read again what I wrote and reply to that. All you are saying is you lived in Colombo for 4 years and you now live in a foreign country. Big deal donkey. Show how mentally challenged you are. Go put a "Gomathamba" on your head!.
Fool before any one can provide free wifi, there has to be a market that sustain it. Like good and services. Some one needs to use the free wifi and spend money and then part of that money will fund the free wifi.  
Do you think a router, fiber access is free fand made from thin air???Jadapalanya promised it as if they were paying for it out of their personal funds. It was an election gundu only. Before you point fingers at others, next time when you visit a country open your eyes, ears and the brain and learn how those countries operate. Learn about their history. Learn how they are at this point in the present and how they got that point.
It is a shame Sri Lanka gave birth to traitors seat warmers like you. Do you understand for you to live free of bombs in Colombo, there are many ranaviru that gave their life and limb. At least have some gratitude. Your ponna Ranil signed a Cease fire agreement without reading it- no different from what he is doing now. Go read it if you know how to find a document. Do you know what he did at Batalanda? Do you know how many southern youth were necklaced with tires and burnt to death???
When you visit other countries look and see how they treat their veteran! It is very different from what Ponil and this Jadapalanya did. I hope you have the brain power to understand that. Thuuk nodokin Perethaya. Traitor to our motherland. Thuuk kalkaniya!!!

@Suraj DeSilvabalapan uba a tikata ranilta kiyla tiyna dewal.gon harako uba wage wahalek ubalata twama midenna bha neda a wahal manasikthwayen.4ys kolaba hitamu mta uba enwada kolaba ynna kiyla denna.mn dn inna rate oni taram free wifi tiynwa. loke awidapn awidala balapn ratawal wala diyunuwa.a ratawala minissunta ubalata wge deshapluwange puka lewaknna welwak nha. Aliyada  pohottuwada bulath koleda mta wdk nha me hema 1ma kle me rata maruwen maruwata kapu 1ka,balapn ubata mn kiypu de rerum gnna trmwath  molayak nhne.ape rate deshapremithwaya tiranaya wela tiyenne paksha deshapalayana math,u krddi hodai mu krddi hoda nha.mokda mama dkke nha a ekekwath a gena ktha krnwa hadk nagnwa.kunuharapa sindu hadapu 1ka  me dws wla  deshapremi bawuddayek welne.eth karume kiynne uta meka penne nathi 1i,

@Tharaka Amarasinghe. Any modaya, yhopi wage gonnu hinda thamai adapi methathwe enne. Thopi free wif walata ravitila me Jadaplanya genawa. Dan kohomada.
Fools like you are on facebook 24x7 but do not even know how to go to colombo and get a copy of the 2013 Panatha or go to a library and do a search for a document or even do a google search and find information. You believe every jokers lie - listen to the Mujibur who lied about  Zaharan and now you believe him??? Stupid as stupid can be.


Modaya, the 2013 act was bought to bring machinery and materiel to the free trade zone- especially for garment industries where cloth styles change, material change very quickly (due to changes in taste and also weather in cold climates). Idea was to get the material in to a closed zone, make clothes and reexport- without delay. No purpose in imposing taxes twice and increasing the price of the exported goods as they have to compete with china lower cost good...


The processing of garbage was done by this Jadaplanya  and inf act signed by the traitor UNP ministers with Singapore. Dhamikka Perera is a traitor to our motherland and should be treated like that for what he did with this trash. Trash was processed by a Diaspora guy in England. I challenge you to find the name.  This UNP traitors  is hand in hand with Diaspora- especially Mongal.


We lived through suicide bombs and we appreciate everything MR did. We remember before MR came, where at the mear mention of LTTE police used to run leaving there weapons. Over thousand soldiers were massacred by LTTE in one attack in Mulative and under Sanghidiyava Chandrika and Ponil. Tey were our brothers and sisters and we will not forget them- unlike you animals that do not even know where you came from. Learn how Palestians now live as refugees in their own motherland--- that is the fate awaiting Sri lankan fools like You!!! Thuuk nodokin ungrateful traitors like you!!!! Read about why the Philippines leader is loved by their people and hated by world powers-- because like MR he is looking after his country and not a tool for world powers like chandrika, ponil and rest of this Jadapalanya!!!!
@siri mewan ashan lanka mahindage chuk golayek wena eka hondai ranilge ponsi puk golayek wenawata wada ha ha
